Name: Toyotama-Hime
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Bo Staff, Flaming Torrent and Razor-Sharp Claws.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Until this model has successfully cast the Shape Shifting Deity spell it may only make attacks with its Bo Staff.
Any attack that targets this model with a Rend Characteristic of -2 or better are treated as having a Rend Characteristic of -1.

Spells.Name: Shape Shifting Deity (20)
Spells.Effect: Until the end of the battle this model may attack with its Flaming Torrent and Razor-Sharp Claws. In addition, this model gains a movement characteristic of 12”, a Dash Characteristic of 8”, a Strength Characteristic of 10, a Durability Characteristic of 6+, a Health Characteristic of 24, an Armour Characteristic of 2+ and the FLY tag. Once this spell has been cast this model may no longer attack with its Bo Staff.
